p:
Core Concepts: The research relating to managerial interpretation was analysed for the core concepts of how it was structured, acquired or mobilised. These core concepts, presented in Table 4, have been summarised below collected under core concept areas.
Dependent:
o
Shaped – Interpretations shaped by factors at the individual, organisational and wider environmental level including framing.
Directing:
o
Advancing or constraining – Frames determine subsequent search parameters.
o
Determining – Interpretation shapes subsequent action.
